title: FS: PSA 4 DRUM --- That's right ... no typo here
author: Archive

posts.post_title: FS: PSA 4 DRUM --- That's right ... no typo here
posts.post_content: Posted By: Scott Levy Time to sell off one of my gems....T206 Drum PSA 4 - Warhop It's a tad stained, but otherwise everything you'd expect from a PSA 4 DRUM (no qualifiers). Open to offers, but likely to accept the first cash offer at around $5k. And if it doesn't sell, I think I can live with having the card a little longer [IMG]http://i263.photobucket.com/albums/ii142/scottglevy/warhopback-1.jpg[/IMG]
